Sentence: Over one hundred years later, Julian's secret chamber is discovered by Doctor Leete, who was preparing the site for the construction of a new laboratory
Doctor Leete revives him (Julian) and takes him (Julian) into his (Julian) home
With Doctor Leete's guidance, Julian comes to understand and appreciate the twentieth-century society
Meanwhile, Julian learns that Doctor Leete's daughter, Edith is the great-granddaughter of Edith Bartlett
Julian and Edith become engaged, much to Doctor Leete's pleasure
